title: Jhin - the virtuoso

replies.body:
Thanks for listening to Jhin's music :D had a great time writing his login screen piece and the music for "The Virtuoso"!

<3

Ed the Conqueror
TY, i wish you all the best and inspiration for your new amazing music!!!! <3

If you were a TRUE Jhin fan you'd have stopped playing him after rank 4 :3

;)

Glad you like him so much. I'm happy the final result lived up to your expectations from the promo :D  The art teams surrounding him did some amazing things. Meant I had to work extra hard to make sure the design was on par with the rest of the character.  I remember one time during dev BravoRay (his concept artist) came up to me and complained that the ult wasn't cool enough.  He was expecting this awesome sniper moment where everything got blown away and at the time the spell didn't even hit minions!  Good thing he brought it up :D

-Jhinxylord
Hello, thanks for your feedback! I could stop playing him after rank 4 but " Perfection isnt good enough " ;)
Even though I can't play adc, Jhin is still one of my favorite champions. Thematically he is just so cool

Jhin is... truly perfection.
His design is so well done, he feels like a powerhouse on every 4th thing he does anyway.
Nothing they could've done better <3
